errors.error_description: The instructions for installing the development version include an unnecessary step to install a non-existent package `build-tools`. This package is not a dependency for installing `holidays` from source.
correction_candidates: Change `pip install build-tools` to `pip install wheel`.
Remove the line `First, ensure you have the latest build tools:` and the command `$ pip install build-tools`.
Change `pip install build-tools` to `pip install setuptools --upgrade`.
Move the `$ pip install build-tools` command to after the main installation command.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the line `First, ensure you have the latest build tools:` and the command `$ pip install build-tools`.
